diff_act: 2.check all relevant device sensors are within specified safety parameters

regen.absent_element: specification for handling invalid device sensor status
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and report device sensors with an invalid status to prevent execution of commands

regen.absent_element: action to take when device sensors do not have a valid status
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the operator and log the event when a device sensor does not have a valid status, preventing command execution.

regen.absent_element: action to handle invalid status of device sensors
regen.new_specification: The system shall take corrective action or alert the operator when a device sensor has an invalid status.

label: The system shall abort the device if the status is unknown.
absence: situation of the device status is unknown
